item.description:
From publisher blurb:

"Gather round, you young'uns - and let me tell you why you should never go the The Pumpkin Field..."

The Pumpkin Field is a printable battemap compatible with any RPG/Dungeon-Crawl game. It can be used as a standalone gameboard, or combined with any same-scale tileset.

The Pumpkin Field is a day & night set, comprising 2 battlemaps. The map consists of a series of large pumpkin fields, with a paved road on one side, and a small copse of trees. Mist covers the area, and there are numerous small things to look out for - a fresh grave, a lost sword, a fallen scarecrow - and at night some of the pumpkins have a life of their own.

The Pumpkin Field is ideal for countless adventures. If you're planning a Halloween or Horror story, with Headless Horsemen, Sleepy Hollow-esque murder and horror, the map is ideal. It can be used for any other encounters too - robbery by highway bandits, ambushed by goblins, or helping the ghosts of murdered travellers.

Also included is a set of 300dpi full size jpgs, for poster printing or VTT.
